name: DEADNIGHT ~Melum of the Departed Souls~
description:
An novice magician girl named Melum sets off to
investigate a cursed village as part of a guild quest.

What awaited her there was a cesspool of darkness.
A clamor of tentacles, demons, monsters and mystery....

A retro horror movie styled large pixel / animation RPG.

  • System *
  • 15 base erotic animations + 13 static images.
  • A game book style, roll the dice and proceed by luck story.
  • Even if you die, you keep you items. No risk restart.
  • Can obscure the text window to enjoy the CG / Anime.
  • Scene reminiscence is merged into the games story.
  • New Game+ item included in game.
